title: Teemo missing from the new game mode?
body: Teemo shows up in the ban process for One for All, but I can't vote for him?

replies.body: These two are troublemakers in this game mode, so they're unavailable to play. :o
Teemo and Karthus are autobanned from OFA.

Teemo is banned because five Teemos = too many mushroom traps.

Karthus is banned because his ult targets every enemy champion globally for near-unavoidable damage. Think about five of them cast at once...

> [{quoted}](name=ow my bones,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vgYFVPTE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-02T23:48:45.607+0000)
>
> Why?

Teemo because they can stall out a game FOREVER andk arthus because people cant build zhonyas
